definitions.definition: Pertaining to antithesis, or opposition of words and sentiments; containing, or of the nature of, antithesis; contrasted.

parsedExamples.example: His wrong-headed beliefs are antithetical to everything we stand for as a community.
This is precisely why insistence on relative truth is antithetical to critical thinking.
